name: testCreateBudgetsAndCorrectForOverspending
description: Create Budgets and correct for overspending FI-T11
descriptionHtml: Create Budgets and correct for overspending FI-T11
statusMessage: If FAIL: There is NO icon to the right of the budget name, or when you hover over it, NO or NOT a message appears: Add an amount every period and correct for overspending expected [Add an amount every period and correct for overspending] but found [The budget amount will increase periodically and will correct for overspending]

steps.name: Click 'Create Budgets' button in the middle
In the auto budget selector, select 'Add an amount every period and correct for overspending'
In the 'Auto-budget amount' field, enter valid numbers,
To the right of the name budget there is an icon, when you hover it, the inscription appears: Add an amount every period and correct for overspending
